Title: Newkirk
Body: Date: Tue, 14 Jan 1997 23:12:42 GMT Server: Apache/1.0.3 Content-type: text/html Content-length: 948 Last-modified: Wed, 20 Mar 1996 17:44:27 GMT Newkirk Evolutionary Dialogs: From signals to sentences in a genetic model of communication Jim Newkirk Computer Science Department Signals are a simple and essential form of animal and human communication alike, but sentences -- signals with structure -- are a distinguishing feature of human speech alone.
